title: PM, Buzdar discuss development matters, overall situation in Punjab
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 23 (APP): Chief Minister Punjab Usman Buzdar called on Prime Minister Imran Khan here on Friday.
During the meeting development matters as well as the overall situation in the province were discussed.
